categories.name: Useful Web Libraries
categories.description: A list of web libraries that I commonly use.

categories.name: Useful Python Libraries
categories.description: A list of my favorite Python libraries.

categories.name: Assets for Projects
categories.description: Assets that can be used in a variety of different projects.

resources.name: Bootstrap
resources.author: the Bootstrap Team
resources.description: A web library designed to make websites look good with minimal code. I use this library on nearly every web app I create, including this site.

resources.name: jQuery
resources.author: the jQuery Foundation
resources.description: A Javascript library that makes communicating between Javascript and HTML much easier.

resources.name: Moment.js
resources.author: the Moment.js team
resources.description: A Javascript library that is great for date and time parsing and formatting.

resources.name: NumPy
resources.author: the NumPy developers
resources.description: This library makes any scientific or mathematical calculations much easier to do and more efficient overall.

resources.name: discord.py
resources.author: @Rapptz
resources.description: A library for easily interfacing with the Discord API.

resources.name: Icon Essential Collection
resources.author: Smashicons
resources.description: A set of great icons to use in any project. I use these in many different icons.

resources.name: KTANE Modkit
resources.author: Steel Crate Games
resources.description: The modding toolkit for creating Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes mods.

resources.name: W3Schools
resources.author: Refsnes Data
resources.description: A reference for anything to do with HTML, CSS, or Javascipt.

resources.name: Stack Overflow
resources.author: Stack Exchange and the Stack Overflow community
resources.description: An awesome question-and-answer site for any questions relating to programming.

resources.name: Python Documentation
resources.author: the Python Software Foundation
resources.description: The documentation for Python, a programming language designed with simplicity in mind and with efficiency at its core. (Also, it's my favorite programming language)

resources.name: Creative Commons Licenses Overview
resources.author: me
resources.description: A infographic chart that I made that describes the many Creative Commons licenses.
